info.title: Bowfishing Action
info.author: linus
info.details:
[Instructions]
-Select difficulty then press start. 
-Press Home to exit menu or to pause game. 
-Aim crosshairs at fish and press A to shoot arrow. 
-Hold wii remote sideways and rotate in a circle to reel. 
-Remember even if you don't hit a fish, you can't shoot again until you reel the arrow in. 
-Go for the GOLD!  

Background music by drabmeat34.
